name: PENGUIN EDUCATIONAL TRUST
briefDescription: An Non- profitable charitable trust established under the guidance of one of its promoter Mrs.Uma NR, an educationalist known for her achievements and contribution in the field of education for nearly two decades,mainly running schools, chain of preschools, women education, empowering teachers for effective teaching methodology conducted more than 350 workshops for teachers trained nearly 630+ women in spoken English and 980 women In NTT transforming lives with the support and guidance of Mr.Naresh P Reganti, Chairman, an IT.
